constituent: ambition, deceased, perish, top hat, fishhook, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, king, jewel, ball
heisigStory: The story of ambition talks of a king walking under the perishing (or "waning") moon dreaming great dreams about his kingdom. (The roots of ambition are from the same word as "ambulate," meaning to walk about.)
koohiiStory1: You´re dead meat, buddy, my ambition is to be king.
koohiiStory2: The ambitions of kings often result in dead bodies.
myStory: hi vọng.tham vọng. cái giết chết nhà vua là tham vọng
readingExamples: 望郷 (ぼうきょう), 希望 (きぼう), 人望 (じんぼう), 望む (のぞ.む)
words: to look anxiously for, to wait eagerly for
good prospects, full of hope, promising
to desire, wish for, see, command (a view of)
